s.text: Then, after the rats knew the route, Lai confused them by dumping powdered milk into the water, making it harder to navigate--the rats had to make it to the platform by memory, rather than by sight.
Not surprisingly, the poor rats couldn't remember the way to the platform after that.
Not surprisingly, the poor rats couldn't remember the way to the platform after that.
Then, after the rats knew the route, Lai confused them by dumping powdered milk into the water, making it harder to navigate--the rats had to make it to the platform by memory, rather than by sight.
Other research will need to be conducted (rats in a tank of juice, I guess, followed by a vat of beer).

Other research will need to be conducted (rats in a tank of juice, I guess, followed by a vat of beer).

It got even worse when Lai removed the platform: The unbombarded rats swam to the place where it should be and looked around with concern; the cellular rats just swam around randomly, like members of the Royal family at the beach.
